channel.title: R Markdown on PLAY Project
channel.description: Recent content in R Markdown on PLAY Project

item.title: Hello, World
item.description: Hello, everyone. This is the first blog post from a test website for the PLAY Project. It uses the blogdown R package and the hugo-academic theme. Let us know what you think.
